sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
ConditionalSplit1@name sink(input(
		ID as string,
		Names as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		ID = id,
		Names = name
	)) ~> sink1
